name: Making Swiss 'shop=yes' (not connected to a gas station) more specific.
description:
In Switzerland we have a bunch of unspecific `shop=yes` which are not connected to a gas station.

According to the [OSM Wiki](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:shop%3Dyes) it "is recommended [...] to avoid this tag in favor of a more specific shop=* value."
Also `shop=yes` are not rendered on the default map style anymore [[1] , [2]].

[1]: https://github.com/gravitystorm/openstreetmap-carto/pull/3718
[2]: https://github.com/gravitystorm/openstreetmap-carto/issues/3697
instruction: Try to make the generic `shop=yes` more specific, based on the information already present, a survey or on a search of the website of the shop via your preferred search engine (I suggest http://ddg.gg :) )
